hero.title: Empowering Your Voice
hero.description: Your vote matters. With VoteSmart, you can participate in secure, transparent, and convenient online elections from anywhere.

features.title: Why Choose VoteSmart?
features.subtitle: The features that make us the most reliable online voting solution.
features.secureDescription: VoteSmart ensures your vote is confidential and secure using top-tier encryption technology.
features.userFriendlyDescription: Simplified design makes voting accessible and intuitive for all users.
features.realTimeDescription: Monitor live election results with complete transparency.
features.mobileDescription: Vote seamlessly from any device, be it a desktop, tablet, or smartphone.
features.accessibilityDescription: Cast your vote at any time with a system available round the clock.
features.ecoFriendlyDescription: A paperless, eco-friendly voting solution that contributes to sustainability.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Participate in elections in just a few simple steps.
howItWorks.step1Description: Create your VoteSmart account to participate in online elections.
howItWorks.step2Description: Securely verify your identity to ensure voting eligibility.
howItWorks.step3Description: Get an email confirmation with voting instructions and updates.
howItWorks.step4Description: Choose your candidates and submit your vote securely.
howItWorks.step5Description: Follow live election updates and view results in real-time.

footer.aboutDescription: Revolutionizing democracy with a secure, transparent, and accessible online voting platform.
